p: “ And He it is who causes gardens to grow, [both] trellised and untrellised, and palm trees and crops of different [kinds of] food and olives and pomegranates, similar and dissimilar. Eat of [each of] its fruit when it yields and give it due [zakah] on the day of its harvest. And be not excessive. Indeed, He does not like those who commit excess” [Surah al-Anaam, 6:141] .
